name: Soul of the Cards
description:
Average Japanese schoolgirl Hitomi's grandmother passed away, leaving her with a deck for a chess-inspired card game called Duel Knights. It seems these simple cards may be more than meets the eye, and she will need to play to uncover their supernatural secrets...

This game was made as a class project in a short span of time. As such, it is only demo-length, with two battles that serve as a prologue to Hitomi's story. Let me know if you'd like to see a follow-up to this!

The game was made using free assets that may be found at the following links:

https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index

SOUND EFFECTS

https://simon13666.itch.io/sound-starter-pack

Animated in Mixamo: https://www.mixamo.com/
